name: certutil

procedures: T1105::[certutil] can be used to download files from a given URL.
T1140::[certutil] has been used to decode binaries hidden inside certificate files as Base64 information.

T1553.004::[certutil] can be used to install browser root certificates as a precursor to performing [Adversary-in-the-Middle] between connections to banking websites. Example command: certutil -addstore -f -user ROOT ProgramData\cert512121.der.

description: [certutil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0160) is a command-line utility that can be used to obtain certificate authority information and configure Certificate Services. (Citation: TechNet Certutil)
